page.title: 09Tollerton, origin of name.
page.content:
The origin of the village name Tollerton is believed to have come from the original settlement in the locality - Torlagh's or Thorlai's farmstead. The evolution of the place name shows the process of contradiction and simplification :- TURLAVESTON 1166 TORLAVISTON 1189 TORLAGHESTON 1231 TORLASTON 1284 TORLATON 1316 TORLETON 1428 TOLLERTON 1546 TOLLARTON 1573 TOLLERTON 1985
{Domesday Survey carried out by the {Junior Class at Plumtree School and {the boys of St. Hugh's College, {Tollerton. Summer 1985.}
